Class MoveController

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    This controller manages all the move actions, controls and stuff

    edoardo

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move​(Player player,
                 Square destination,
                 int maxDistanceAllowed)
          throws NotAllowedMoveException
        Given a Player, a destination Square and the maxDistanceAllowed, this method changes the player position only if the move is allowed by the map configuration.
        Parameters:
        player - player to be moved
        destination - destination of the move action
        maxDistanceAllowed - integer representing the maximum distance of move allowed measured in squares
        Throws:
        NotAllowedMoveException - if you cannot make such move with such input paramenters

      • isAllowedMove

        public boolean isAllowedMove​(Square startingPoint,
                             Square destination,
                             int maxDistance)
        This method verifies that the minimum distance between the 2 input squares is less than the maxDistance setted as parameter. How: exploring the map. - form the starting point i explore all the squares directly linked. (dist = 1) - then i explore all linked squares to the squares thar were linked to the starting point (list = 2)
        Parameters:
        startingPoint - starting point sqaure of the control
        destination - destination square to analize
        maxDistance - max distance allowed
        Returns:
        returns true if the move is allowed, false if not

      • minDistBetweenSquares

        public int minDistBetweenSquares​(Square startingPoint,
                                 Square destination)
        This method returns the minimum distance between 2 given squares
        Parameters:
        startingPoint - sqaure starting point of evaluation
        destination - destination for evaluation
        Returns:
        minimum percurrible distance
